New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

From the brand

Pritom is a leading independent brand selling Tablet PC, Laptops, Mp3 since 2012, focusing on product quality and customer shopping experience.Our products have received CE, RoHS, FCC and other related certificates- – Pritom Team aims to provide the Highest Quality Products and the Most Attentive Service for our customers. SO if you have any questions/issues, please reach us via Email, we will give a solution asap! That it is important for us!

Enjoy Time with PRITOM Tablets

Pritom 7 inch Kids Tablets

Pritom 7 inch Kids Tablets

★[HIGH PERFORMANCE ANDROID TABLET ] – Pritom L8 tablet came with android operating system, 2GB RAM, 32 GB ROM, the powerful and energy-saving Quad-core Processor, enables quick app launch, smooth videos and overall performance. PRITOM L8 Tablet includes a micro TF card slot which can be added a 128 GB SD/TF card Max, making it easier to store more ebooks, songs, pictures, videos, and download more games. If you would like to get a tablet case for it, please search PRITOM L8 Tablet Case.
★[LONG-LASTING ENTERTAINMENT] – This 8 inch tablet features android 10 Go and Google Certified, you can download thousands of apps, such as Netflix, Facebook, YouTube, Netflix etc.. The 3900mAh battery and low-power CPU enhance your experience and allow you to enjoy up to 8 hours of mixed reading, watching TV shows, surfing the web, playing light games. It is really a good companion for your leisure time and entertainment.
★[BRILLIANT IPS DISPLAY ] – Pritom 8 inch tablet PC adopts a 1280×800 brilliant HD IPS display. Enjoy brilliant colors, crisp text, vivid video viewing and comfortable sound when you watch videos or play games. Pritom android tablet has a sharper hierarchy of images and richer colors, and provides shocking performance of visual experience. With the Eye Health mode, an extra feature optimizes the backlight for a more comfortable reading experience. Lightweight and portable,beyond your imagination
★[LOW BLOATWARE & DUAL CAMERA] – Pritom Tronpad L8 Tablet equipped with Front 2.0 MP & Rear 8.0 MP dual cameras, it is convenient for taking photos, capturing and sharing those special moments with your friends and family. Pritom Tronpad tablet meets your basic daily needs, slim-body and lightweight and easy to carry anywhere, such as kitchen countertop, desktop, outside or a leisure place – watching videos, Live and reading. A good tablet for your choise, very Low bloatware, No ads.
★[1-year WARRANTY & SUPPORT] – Pritom Tablet PC comes with 1-year worry-free guarantee – If it is the tablet quality issue, return it and we’ll replace it for free. Pritom team focuses on the customer’s pleasant shopping experience and provides reliable customer service. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any problem, we will give you on-time TECH SUPPORT and the better customer service. Looking foward to hearing from you(CS email).

  • Pritom Tronpad L8 Tablet built-in high performance Quad-core Processor and Stable Android 10 Go Operating System.(Upgraded Since November, 2021)
  • PRITOM Tablet fits for everyone. PRITOM tends to create the best products and the best user experience. Lightweight and portable tablet or ideal gift? PRITOM Tablet, worth having!

Fast and Responsive

  • The powerful and energy-saving quad-core processor delivers the perfect mix of power and performance, provides a smoother videos watching, web pages loading quicker and more efficiently apps running.
  • Please do NOT Hesitate to send us a message if you have any issues/questions, PRITOM TECH SUPPORT TEAM will help within 24h!!!

Shocking Viewing Experience

  • With 1280*800 HD IPS Display, Pritom Tablets provide a sharper hierarchy of images and richer colors, perfect for web browsing and movies viewing.
  • Have fun with this tablet, Big screen meets your viewing needs!

Large Storage Space

  • An extra 128GB Expendable storage, allows you to store more videos, documents and pictures.F
  • ree thousands of apps compatible, what you need to do is just logging into Google Play Store and download free Android apps, like Netflix, YouTube, Tik Tok etc.

Capture Life’s Moments

  • PRITOM L8 features a 2.0 MP front + 8.0 MP rear-facing camera for taking photos or shooting 1080p video. Sharing those special moments with your friends and family.

Read more

Access to Entertainment

  • PRITOM L8 Tablet with GMS Certified, easily get more entertainment on this tablet. Enjoy all your favorite movies and TV shows on YouTube and more.
  • Read comfotably with millions of eBook and magazine on line. Play more free popular games, social media and movie provider apps, and so much more.

Unique Design

  • Pritom L8 tablet built-in a high-quality BOX Speaker, sounds better and clearer.
  • There will be a PRITOM L8 tablet case(TC103, good-look) for this Pad NOW, if you wanna buy it, please search PRITOM L8 Tablet Case on amazon.

Slim-body & Lightweight

  • Pritom L8 is only weight of 0.73 lb, so you can put it into your bag with only occupying a small space.
  • Easy to carry and use in kitchen countertop, desktop, outside or a leisure place.

Read more

Long Battery Life

  • The Pritom L8 tablet is normally up to 4 hours video playback and up to 7 hours reading time. Fully charges in under 2-3 hours using the micro-USB power adapter.
  • It is a tablet for kids, Great, Valued gift of your choice.

★[HIGH PERFORMANCE ANDROID TABLET ] – Pritom Tronpad tablets comes with Android 10 Go OS, 2GB RAM, 32 GB ROM, the powerful and energy-saving Quad-core Processor enables quicker app launch, smoother videos, you can enjoy better overall performance experience. In addition, it includes a Micro SD card slot (can be added a expanded 256 GB TF Card Max, NOT included), making it easy to store Pictures videos, files etc. There is NO extra bloatware installed. Note: This tablet can’t add a SIM Card.
★[LONG-LASTING ENTERTAINMENT] – Pritom 10 inch tablet features android 10, GMS Certified, you can download thousands of apps, such as, Netflix, YouTube, Skype, and more popular apps. The large battery and low-power CPU enhance your experience and allow you to enjoy up to 8 hours of mixed reading, watching TV shows, surfing the web, playing light games and more. It is a really good companion for your leisure and entertainment. Large IPS Touchscreen will be a plus.
★[Low bloatware & Dual Cameras] – With Front 2.0 MP & Rear 8.0 MP camera, which would bring your photos and videos to life. Pritom Tronpad 10” tablet rivals most of the 10 inch tablet and it is convenient for taking photos, capturing and sharing those special moments with your friends and family. Pritom Tronpad tablet meets your basic daily needs, such as watching videos, Live and reading. A good tablet for your choise, very Low bloatware, No ads!
★[BRILLIANT IPS DISPLAY ] – Pritom 10 inch tablet PC adopts a 1280 x 800 brilliant HD IPS display. This android tablet has a sharper hierarchy of images and richer colors, and provides shocking performance of visual experience. With the Eye Health mode, an extra feature filters out blue light to relieve visual fatigue, and optimizes the backlight for a more comfortable reading experience.
★[1-year WARRANTY & SUPPORT] – Pritom Tablet PC comes with 1-year worry-free guarantee – If it is the tablet quality issue, return it and we’ll replace it for free. Pritom team focuses on the customer’s pleasant shopping experience and provides reliable customer service. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any problem, we will give you on-time TECH SUPPORT and the better customer service. Looking foward to hearing from you(CS email).

PRITOM Tronpad Tablets, Meet All Your Basic Needs

  • PRITOM Tonpad tablet fits for everyone. This tablet has a large 10.1 inch high-definition touchscreen, 1280 * 800 IPS Display, 2.0 MP front and 8.0 MP rear camera. The ultra-high tablet configuration meets all your daily needs!
  • PRITOM tends to create the best products and the best user experience. Lightweight and portable tablets or ideal gifts? PRITOM Tablet, it’s worth having!

Designed for Entertainment

  • The 10 inch tablet came with the high-performance overall configuration, No Ads, No extra bloatware installed.
  • Delivers the perfect mix of power, portability and performance – flawlessly running games and apps, as well as quicker loads of web pages, Free thousands of apps. Just logging into Google Play Store and download free apps, like Tik Tok YouTube/Kids etc.

Greater Battery Capacity

  • The tablet equipped with a large lithium battery, that allows you to enjoy up to 8 hours of mixed reading, watching TV shows, surfing the web, playing light games and more
  • You can use your 10” tablet to spend time while traveling or moving. It is really a good companion for your leisure and entertainment. Support GPS.

Quality Audiovisual Experience

  • The android tablet PC adopts a 1280 x 800 brilliant HD IPS display, Enjoy wide screen movies and games with wide viewing angles, less glare, and more brightness while you watch.
  • And with two loudspeakers, can enjoy clear sound quality when you watch videos or play games

Read more

Large Storage Space

  • This Android tablet comes bundled with 32GB ROM, and up to 128GB of external memory with micro SD card support（Not included in this tablet).
  • No more worrying about tablet memory. Huge room(128 GB Expandable) for everything, from your go-to shows to your favorite games.

HD Camera

  • The PRITOM M10 Android tablets features a 8.0MP rear-facing camera .it is convenient for taking photos, capturing and sharing those special moments wherever you like.
  • The 2.0 MP front-facing camera is perfect for Selfie and Skype calls with friends and family.Give you a perfect time.

Tablet Cover Case

  • PLEASE NOTE: Tablet Cover Case Is Sold Separately. You can search PRITOM Tronpad 10 inch tablet case for this tablet PC.
  • Good basic tablet, Very low bloatware, No ads!

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.99 - $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:40 UTC – Details)



Unlocked Smartphone

The TCL 30XL works with most major U.S. carriers, including Verizon, AT&T and T-Mobile (Sprint not included). This android phone is also compatible with Metro PCS, Simple Mobile, Cricket, Ultra Mobile, H2O, Tello, Consumer Cellular, RedPocket (Only GSMA network), Pure talk, Viya, etc. If your phone doesn’t work with Verizon, please restart the phone. If your cell phone experiences an error when making calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices with the assistance of Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative. For Straight Talk and TracFone, this model only supports T-Mobile and AT&T compatible Sim cards but does not support Verizon compatible sim card. This mobile phone isn’t compatible with other CDMA networks, such as Sprint, Assurance wireless, Spectrum, Xfinity, Boost Mobile, etc.

WIFI Calling:

This phone supports WIFI Calling on the following Carriers: T-Mobile, Metro, Straight talk(AT&T and T-Mobile), Simple, Cricket, Ultra.

Technical Parameters：

Display: 6.82 inch V-notch HD+ 20.5:9 display (720 x 1640 pixels)
Screen: LCD
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+5MP Ultra-Wide Angle Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 13MP
Chipset: MT6762V
CPU: 4*A53 2.0Ghz + 4*A53 1.5Ghz Octa-Core
GPU: IMG GE8320
Memory: 6GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Expandable up to 512GB with Micro SD card, SD card not included)
Dimensions: 6.78 x 3.03 x 0.36 inch
Weight (g): 204.4g
Battery: 5000mAh 9V2A
2G Bands: GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands: B2/4/5
4G LTE Bands: B2/4/5/12 (MFBI)/13/66/71/25/26/41HPUE
Sim Card: Single Sim, Nano-sized
Audio: Dual Speaker
Audio Jack: 3.5mm audio jack
System Language: English, Spanish and French

What’s Included

1 x TCL 30 XL Mobile phone
1 x 18W Charger (9V 2A)
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Sim Card Tray Pin
1 x Quick Guide
1 x LCD sticker
1 x Product Safety Information

Cinematic Viewing Experience – Featuring a 6.82 inch expansive screen with 20.5:9 aspect ratio and dual speakers design, the TCL 30XL android phone allows you to enjoy the thrill of cinematic viewing. The unique TCL NXTVISION Technology is able to boost color, clarity and contrast of visuals while protecting your eyes from harmful blue light. This TCL phone can work as a decent gaming phone, and is also perfect for streaming video and making video calls.
Large Battery, Fun for All Day – The 5000mAh mighty battery of this unlocked android smartphone can power up your entertainment for up to 3 days on one charge (estimated data based on internal lab test). With 18W fast-charging and an on-the-go reverse charging (OTG cable not included) option you can fuel and refuel your mobile phone in an instant.
Powerful, Smooth and Safe – With the 6GB Ram storage and Octa-Core processor, this unlocked cell phone provides you with an instant response time. Keep all of your precious memories with the 64GB built-in storage, and even more with a Micro SD card (sold separately) that lets you add up to 512GB memory. You can also multitask smoothly thanks to the Android 12 operating system and the floating window mode. The phone’s face unlock technology brings a carefree experience with abundant joy.
Seize the Beauty of Life – Explore the allure of highly detailed shots and broad landscape with the 50MP AI quad camera of this android phone. The AI camera system can optimize your picture according to different lighting conditions, and clear any unnecessary object that you select in the background, allowing you to be the protagonist all the time. The 13MP front-facing selfie camera of this stylish smartphone can capture you in a unique way.

BYYBUO – Goal

BYYBUO – New Products

In the spirit of focus, innovation and efficiency, we will provide more customers with a series of more popular and more cost-effective electronic products!

Follow Me

Follow our flagship store, you will be the first to know the latest discounts and new products, let’s do it!

【Cost Effective Tablet 10.1 inch】Preferential price, multi-function, fast Internet access, reading, watching movies, games, music, study, work, dual camera, support Bluetooth 4.2, 2.4G WiFi, GPS, FM, it is a popular tablet to meet the daily leisure needs.
【Fashionable and Portable】10.1 inch tablet 1280*800 HD display screen tablets, 5 MP front camera, 8 MP rear camera. Sensitive touch screen & 2 high fidelity speaker with chamber. All metal body, exquisite appearance, looks fashionable and high-end.
【Latest Android Tablet】The Latest GMS certified Android 11 system, pre-installed Google Play supports Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Tiktok, Line, Instagram and other trendy social apps. Support various video decoding formats, have it 3.5mm stereo headphone port and MIC Port.
【High Performance】Smartpad A10 is equipped with high performance Quad-core CPU, running smoothly and naturally, suited for multi-taskin and it easy to switch between different apps. 2GB RAM 32GB ROM and external TF card supportable to 128GB. 6000mAh large capacity battery can last 12 hours for general usages, standby for up to 10 days.
【Good Gift and Service Guarantee】 This is a good gift for friends, and for your own daily leisure.it also a tablet for kids to learn and tablet for seniors easy to use. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will try our best for you.

10.1” 1280*800 IPS large HD display, giving you a more realistic visual experience!

Adopt G+G 2.5D touch panel, the advantages are hard and wear-resistant, corrosion-resistant, high light transmittance, smooth control and high reliability.

6000mAh long-lasting battery—- up to 12 hours mixed usage of watching, reading and over 72 hours of standby time.

Note: Battery life will vary based on device settings and Apps usage.

Read more

  • 10.1″TFT LCD (1280*800 IPS )
  • Google Android 11
  • 2GB RAM/32GB ROM (Expandable to 128GB)
  • 6000mAh Long Battery Life
  • Powerful Quad-core
  • 5.0M Front/ 8.0M Rear Dual Camera
  • Dual High Fidenity Speaker
  • 2.4g WiFi/Bluetooth4.2

What About BYYBUO Smartpad A10 Tablets ？

Why Choose BYYBUO Smartpad A10 Tablets ?

Smartpad A10 is a tablet that we focus on promoting because of its high performance and high cost performance. Multifunction and suitable for all kinds of scenes, whether family entertainment or work. It has a fashionable appearance and a gift box, it is a good gift choice for friends and relatives.

Professional and considerate pre-sales and after-sales service makes your shopping convenient and pleasant.

BYYBUO, gives you a wonderful e-life experience!

Package(Gift box):

  • Tablet x1
  • USB-C Cable x1

Entertainment for All

High-definition picture quality & high fidelity dual-speaker design gives you a more powerful visual & auditory experience when watching movies and listening to songs.

Lightweight design makes it easy to enjoy movies and music on the go, record beautiful scenery and moments. Make your life more happier and beautiful!

GPS sensor

Built-in GPS, Beidou, Glonass navigation sensor. A tablet suitable for use in the car to provide navigation help for your travel.

Good ideas for cooking

When you need to see the menu for cooking, this HD large screen tablet can provide you with all kinds of recipes you want, you can watch food videos while cooking, which is a good helper.

Tablet for kids

The tablet PC can bring a lot of fun for your kids, it is a good helper for children to learn knowledge, explore the unknown world, and answer children’s “why” questions.

Tablet for seniors

A tablet for seniors easy to use large screen,10.1 inch HD touch screen, simple operation page and adjustable font size are easy for seniors to operate, bring more fun to elderly and enjoy the life of digital technology.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $329.99 - $249.94
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:22:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Choose KAMRUI, Choose Professional Mini PC

KAMRUI JK06 FANLESS MINI DESKTOP PC

—A partner you need whether in the office or at home—

Are you still worried about your traditional desktop pc taking up a large space? Don’t worry!

The new KAMRUI JK06 mini pc with the magnetic stand is a sleek alternative to a traditional tower PC.

■ The fanless design, more silent!

■ Honeycomb design, more solid!

■ The magnetic stand, more steady!

■ Expandable storage, more capacity!

■ Compact size and lightweight, more flexible!

■ The 11th gen N5100 processor with low consumption, more durable!

Add More Power to Your Workspace with the KAMRUI JK06 Mini PC with 11th-gen Intel processor

The fanless mini pc is equipped with an 11th generation Intel Jasper Lake N5100 (4M Cache, up to 2.90 GHz ) processor. Compared to the Intel Celeron Jasper Lake N5095 (15W), a low-power 6W Mini computer that reduces power consumption by up to 150%. For performance, the JK06 mini computer tower is improved by 30% more than Intel Celeron J4125. Lower power consumption makes it generate less heat and has outstanding performance.

Create A More Peaceful Environment for Your Lovely Babies or Wife

Let’s take a closer look, and see what we discover!

Packed with Connectivity

Designed with 2 x USB 2.0 ports, 2 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x Type C (data transfer only), 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x HDMI port and 1x VGA port (# of Displays Supported: # of 2), 1 x Audio Jack port.

Strong Network Support

KAMRUI JK06 micro computer providing Wi-Fi-5, Bluetooth 4.2, 2.4G+5G dual band WiFi and network connectivity, these ensures you can do everything you want at the speeds you need.

Install the OS You Want

KAMRUI JK06 mini computer tower preinstalled Windows 11 pro OS. Moreover, if you want to install Windows 10, Ubuntu or Linux. The compact pc will support and be compatible with different operating systems.

Transfer Files in Seconds

Transfer movies, photos, and music at speeds of up to 5 Gbps via the USB-C port and the dual USB 3.0 ports, saving you time on large file transfers between your mini pc and external hard drives or networks.

To Create! To Win! Don’t Let the Storage Limit Your Imagination

Massive storage capacity for storing huge amounts of pictures, videos, music and more.

KAMRUI small form factor pc has 3 ways to expand the storage as below:

1. The micro SD card slot also support up to 128GB of expandable storage;

2. It’s expandable with the addition of up to 2 TB of 2.5-inch SSD or HDD[NOT INCLUDED] fitted in the base expansion box.

3. The mini pc designed with 4 USB ports which you can add USB flash drives[NOT INCLUDED] or external hard drives[NOT INCLUDED].

Designed for Those who Work and Study in A Small Space Without Much Room on Their Desk

With JK06 mini PC versatility, plus better connectivity with HDMI 2.0 (4K@60Hz) and VGA ports(1080 P), the compact and lightweight PC adapts to you.

The magnetic stand that comes with JK06 minipc as a gift, it is a capable and affordable Windows 11 Pro desktop computer that you can place almost anywhere given its small form factor. Whether vertical or horizontal style placed if you entered an idea bottleneck, why not try a different placed mode? If you don’t want to JK06 mini pc comes with the magnetic stand, just take the stand off to make it lay down on the desk. It’s time to think outside the box. Just put it on your desk in a different way as you want.

Not Only a Business Mini PC, But Also a Home Mini Computer

KAMRUI Express Service Channels and Warm Tips

*Regardless of your dissatisfaction with our products for any reason, please let us know so that the problem can be resolved promptly and quickly.

These are the steps to find the seller: “Log in Amazon” → “Your Account” → “Your orders” → “Ask Product Question.”

Service: We have a 12-month shelf life for return and exchange, the first reply within 24 hours, and 1-to-1 professional service personnel to answer any questions for you. Your use is only the beginning of our service.

Warm Tips:

Installing unofficial systems may cause driver incompatibility or instability. We highly recommended installing the official factory system.To avoid initial setup issues, the first time you use this mini pc, don’t connect network or wifi until the windows system of your mini pc is running.

【POWERFUL COMPUTING CAPACITY】The JK06 mini PC features a Quad-Core Intel 11th generation Jasper Laker N5100(4M Cache, up to 2.80 GHz). Lower power consumption of 6W makes it less heat, and more outstanding endurance performance than Intel Celeron J4125, N5105 and N5095 processors. It’s versatile enough to handle most any workload, light gaming or general computing. Whether you use it for professional or personal needs, it’ll give you all the power you require.
【ENJOY SPACE-SAVING WORKSPACE】The JK06 mini tower computer has black housing and a compact form factor that’s about 6.88×5.31×1.57-inch. A low-power PC that is so convenient that you can place this fully fetched Windows 11 Ready PC on your desk. With the free attached magnetic stand, you can place vertical or horizontal styles as you want. That is not the only advantage of the compact sized PC. With low power consumption, it’s a sleek alternative to a traditional tower PC.
【GREAT ASSISTANT FOR YOU】The JK06 mini desktop pc doesn’t just a honeycomb design, it also features ventilation holes on the housing to improve heat dissipation and reliability. This efficient thermal management keeps its cool even under the heaviest processing loads. Indeed, featuring the fanless design, when you work from home, and absolutely quiet micro computer will not disturb your cute babies or lovely pets.
【PERSONAL DATA DATABASE】8GB RAM memory means you get to the files that you need quicker. Storage 256GB M.2 Solid State Drive(MAX. 2TB), which provides plenty of storage room and high-performance responsiveness to access and run your applications quickly. There’s an SD card slot for additional storage. If you need more storage to expand, 2.5-inch SSD(MAX. 2TB)would be your great choice. Don’t let the storage to limit your imagination. To Creative, To Win.
【4K UHD DUAL SCREEN SUPPORT】The JK06 micro computer has one HDMI 2.0 and one VGA port that supports dual screen display, which setup has two modes-mirror or extended modes to analyze data better and improve work efficiency. Built-in Intel UHD Graphics, surfing websites using Chrome and other browsers, as well as watching Netflix, Youtube, Hulu, Philo, and other streaming services. It is fast enough to decode and accelerate UHD video content 4096×2160 video playback at 60 Hz.
【WORK AND PLAY ANYWHERE】The JK06 small PC has all the ports you need for all the peripherals you need including 1 x DC, 1 x Type C(data transfer only), 2 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x LAN, 1 x HDMI, 1 x VGA, 1 x Audio in&out and 1 x TF Card slots. What’s more, it supports Linux, Wake On LAN, RTC Wake, and Auto Power On. Work and play your way virtually anywhere.
【FIND MORE PLEASURE ON JK06】The small form factor pc is perfect for a wide range of business scenarios, including signage, point-of-sale (POS) systems and intelligent vending machines. Whether it’s online chatting or professional video meetings, the dual band Wi-Fi 2.4G+5G connection is up to the task. It’s perfect for home office, light games, digital security and surveillance, digital signage, media center, conference room etc. Also Ideal for visually home entertainment, HTPC.
【ALL-AROUND PROTECTION】Say goodbye to the traditional desktop computer. KAMRUI JK06 mini pc with the magnetic holder which is equipped with a layer of silicone on the bottom. The comprehensive protection design makes leaves zero scratches on the desk. Moreover, whenever you need us, KAMRUI employees will always be here and handle all problems for you. Who wouldn’t want a mini pc? A great gift idea for your parent, friend, family or elders etc.

KAMRUI Mini PC

Choose KAMRUI, Choose Professional Mini PC

Previous page
    • KAMRUI are an integrated high-tech enterprise of computer technology committed to R&D, production, and sales of smart products like Mini PC, and pc stick.
    1. KAMRUI Mini PCs blend a stylish design, high-performance professional features and an incredible end-user experience for office and home use, gaming, business, home entertainment, and so on.
